## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Describe the problem this feature would solve or the benefit it would provide.
Example: "I want to trigger different lights for different drums..."

## Proposed Solution
How would you like this feature to work?

## Alternative Solutions
Have you considered any alternative approaches?

## Hardware Requirements
Would this feature require additional hardware?
- [ ] No additional hardware needed
- [ ] Requires additional sensors

- [ ] Requires different Arduino board
- [ ] Other (please specify):

## Implementation Ideas
If you have ideas about how to implement this, share them here:
- Code snippets
- Circuit diagrams
- Libraries to use

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.
